name: agregarr
description: Agregarr is a self-hosted RSS feed aggregator built to help users follow news, blogs, and content in an organized interface. It features a clean web UI, tag-based sorting, and easy syncing. Designed for minimal setup and personal use.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Aggregate all RSS feeds in one self-hosted location. One place for all your content

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Quick filtering and discovery with tag-based sorting. Find content instantly

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track news sources, blogs, and websites together. Everything in one dashboard

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Automatic synchronization keeps feeds updated everywhere. Read from any device

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive interface that never slows down your reading. Smooth, efficient experience
